{"id":422894389,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1606031986,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/422894389/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        bool sign;\n        long int pro=1;\n        int l=0;\n        vector<int> num;\n        if(x>0) sign=0;\n        else sign=1;\n        x=abs(x);\n        for(int i=0;x!=0;i++){\n            num.push_back(x%10);\n            x/=10;\n            if(i>=9 && num[0]>=3){\n                return 0;\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=num.size()-1;i>=0;i--){\n            l+=pro*num[i];\n            pro*=10;\n        }\n        if(!sign) return l;\n        else return -l;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer"}
